trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync
trans-unit.target: StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync

trans-unit.source: StorageFile.Properties
trans-unit.target: StorageFile.Properties

trans-unit.source: StorageItemContentProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync
trans-unit.target: StorageItemContentProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync

trans-unit.source: Get properties—top-level, basic, and extended—for a file represented by a [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) object.
trans-unit.target: Get properties—top-level, basic, and extended—for a file represented by a [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) object.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Also see the [File access sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619995).
trans-unit.target: **Note** Also see the [File access sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619995).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Understand async programming for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps
trans-unit.target: Understand async programming for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps

trans-unit.source: You can learn how to write asynchronous apps in C\# or Visual Basic, see [Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187337).
trans-unit.target: You can learn how to write asynchronous apps in C\# or Visual Basic, see [Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187337).

trans-unit.source: To learn how to write asynchronous apps in C++, see [Asynchronous programming in C++](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187334).
trans-unit.target: To learn how to write asynchronous apps in C++, see [Asynchronous programming in C++](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187334).

trans-unit.source: Access permissions to the location
trans-unit.target: Access permissions to the location

trans-unit.source: For example, the code in these examples require the **picturesLibrary** capability, but your location may require a different capability or no capability at all.
trans-unit.target: For example, the code in these examples require the **picturesLibrary** capability, but your location may require a different capability or no capability at all.

trans-unit.source: To learn more, see [File access permissions](file-access-permissions.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn more, see [File access permissions](file-access-permissions.md).

trans-unit.source: Getting a file's top-level properties
trans-unit.target: Getting a file's top-level properties

trans-unit.source: Many top-level file properties are accessible as members of the [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) class.
trans-unit.target: Many top-level file properties are accessible as members of the [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) class.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the files attributes, content type, creation date, display name, file type, and so on.
trans-unit.target: These properties include the files attributes, content type, creation date, display name, file type, and so on.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Remember to declare the **picturesLibrary** capability.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Remember to declare the **picturesLibrary** capability.

trans-unit.source: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's top-level properties.
trans-unit.target: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's top-level properties.

trans-unit.source: Getting a file's basic properties
trans-unit.target: Getting a file's basic properties

trans-unit.source: Many basic file properties are obtained by first calling the [**StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701737) method.
trans-unit.target: Many basic file properties are obtained by first calling the [**StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701737) method.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a [**BasicProperties**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212113) object, which defines properties for the size of the item (file or folder) as well as when the item was last modified.
trans-unit.target: This method returns a [**BasicProperties**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212113) object, which defines properties for the size of the item (file or folder) as well as when the item was last modified.

trans-unit.source: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's basic properties.
trans-unit.target: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's basic properties.

trans-unit.source: Getting a file's extended properties
trans-unit.target: Getting a file's extended properties

trans-unit.source: Aside from the top-level and basic file properties, there are many properties associated with the file's contents.
trans-unit.target: Aside from the top-level and basic file properties, there are many properties associated with the file's contents.

trans-unit.source: These extended properties are accessed by calling the [**BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212124) method.
trans-unit.target: These extended properties are accessed by calling the [**BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212124) method.

trans-unit.source: (A [**BasicProperties**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212113) object is obtained by calling the [**StorageFile.Properties**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227225) property.) While top-level and basic file properties are accessible as properties of a class—[**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) and **BasicProperties**, respectively—extended properties are obtained by passing an [IEnumerable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=313091) collection of [String](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=325032) objects representing the names of the properties that are to be retrieved to the **BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync** method.
trans-unit.target: (A [**BasicProperties**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212113) object is obtained by calling the [**StorageFile.Properties**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227225) property.) While top-level and basic file properties are accessible as properties of a class—[**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) and **BasicProperties**, respectively—extended properties are obtained by passing an [IEnumerable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=313091) collection of [String](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=325032) objects representing the names of the properties that are to be retrieved to the **BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync** method.

trans-unit.source: This method then returns an [IDictionary](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=325238) collection.
trans-unit.target: This method then returns an [IDictionary](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=325238) collection.

trans-unit.source: Each extended property is then retrieved from the collection by name or by index.
trans-unit.target: Each extended property is then retrieved from the collection by name or by index.

trans-unit.source: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, specifies the names of desired properties (**DataAccessed** and **FileOwner**) in a [List](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=325246) object, passes that [List](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=325246) object to [**BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212124) to retrieve those properties, and then retrieves those properties by name from the returned [IDictionary](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=325238) object.
trans-unit.target: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, specifies the names of desired properties (**DataAccessed** and **FileOwner**) in a [List](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=325246) object, passes that [List](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=325246) object to [**BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br212124) to retrieve those properties, and then retrieves those properties by name from the returned [IDictionary](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=325238) object.
